name: CONTRIBUCION EMPLEADOR
query:
SELECT
 `tabSalary Slip`.cedula_o_pasaporte AS `cedula`,
 `tabSalary Slip`.posting_date AS `FECHA:Date:80`,
 `tabSalary Slip`.employee_name AS `NOMBRE:Read Only:160`,
 `tabSalary Slip`.salario_base AS `BASE:Float:100`,
`tabSalary Slip`.tasa_de_cambio AS `TASA:Read Only:100`,

	
	IF (`tabSalary Slip`.tasa_de_cambio != 0,`tabSalary Slip`.tasa_de_cambio * 
	SUM(CASE WHEN 
	salary_component = 'US Retroactivo' OR	
	salary_component = 'US Ingresos Extraordinarios Cotizables Actual Quincena' OR
	salary_component = 'US Otros Ingresos Extraordinarios Cotizables' OR
	salary_component = 'US Otros Ingresos Extraordinarios No cotizables' OR
	salary_component = 'US Ingresos Extraordinarios Cotizables Quincena Anterior' OR
	salary_component = 'US Ingreso Extrordinarios Pagados Quincena Anterior' OR
	salary_component = 'US Ingresos Extraordinarios No Cotizables' OR
	salary_component = 'US Cesantía' OR
	salary_component = 'US Vacaciones' OR
	salary_component = 'US Pre-aviso' OR
	salary_component = 'US Horas Extras Domingos y Feriados' OR
	salary_component = 'US Horas Extras Nocturnas' OR
	salary_component = 'US Horas Extras Diurnas' OR
	salary_component = 'US Bonificacion' OR
	salary_component = 'US Bonos por Desempeño' OR
	salary_component = 'US Comisiones' OR
	salary_component = 'US Salario de Navidad'
	THEN
	`tabSalary Detail`.amount
	ELSE
	0
	END
	),
	SUM(CASE WHEN 
	salary_component = 'Retroactivo' OR	
	salary_component = 'Ingresos Extraordinarios Cotizables Actual Quincena' OR
	salary_component = 'Otros Ingresos Extraordinarios Cotizables' OR
	salary_component = 'Otros Ingresos Extraordinarios No cotizables' OR
	salary_component = 'Ingresos Extraordinarios Cotizables Quincena Anterior' OR
	salary_component = 'Ingreso Extrordinarios Pagados Quincena Anterior' OR
	salary_component = 'Ingresos Extraordinarios No Cotizables' OR
	salary_component = 'Cesantía' OR
	salary_component = 'Vacaciones' OR
	salary_component = 'Pre-aviso' OR
	salary_component = 'Horas Extras Domingos y Feriados' OR
	salary_component = 'Horas Extras Nocturnas' OR
	salary_component = 'Horas Extras Diurnas' OR
	salary_component = 'Bonificacion' OR
	salary_component = 'Bonos por Desempeño' OR
	salary_component = 'Comisiones' OR
	salary_component = 'Salario de Navidad'
	THEN
	`tabSalary Detail`.amount
	ELSE
	0
	END
	)
	) AS `Otros Ingresos:Float:100`,
 
IF (`tabSalary Slip`.tasa_de_cambio != 0, `tabSalary Slip`.tasa_de_cambio * MAX(IF(salary_component = 'US SFS1 EMPLEADOR', `tabSalary Detail`.amount,
    (IF(salary_component = 'US SFS2 EMPLEADOR', `tabSalary Detail`.amount,"0")))),MAX(IF(salary_component = 'SFS1 EMPLEADOR', `tabSalary Detail`.amount,
    (IF(salary_component = 'SFS2 EMPLEADOR', `tabSalary Detail`.amount,"0"))))) AS "SFS:Float:75",

IF (`tabSalary Slip`.tasa_de_cambio != 0, `tabSalary Slip`.tasa_de_cambio * MAX(IF(salary_component = 'US AFP1 EMPLEADOR', `tabSalary Detail`.amount,
    (IF(salary_component = 'US AFP2 EMPLEADOR', `tabSalary Detail`.amount,"0")))),MAX(IF(salary_component = 'AFP1 EMPLEADOR', `tabSalary Detail`.amount,
    (IF(salary_component = 'AFP2 EMPLEADOR', `tabSalary Detail`.amount,"0"))))) AS "AFP:Float:75",

IF (`tabSalary Slip`.tasa_de_cambio != 0, `tabSalary Slip`.tasa_de_cambio * MAX(IF(salary_component = 'US INFOTEP', `tabSalary Detail`.amount, "0")),
MAX(IF(salary_component = 'INFOTEP', `tabSalary Detail`.amount, "0"))) AS "INFOTEP:Float:75",


IF (`tabSalary Slip`.tasa_de_cambio != 0, `tabSalary Slip`.tasa_de_cambio * MAX(IF (salary_component = 'US SEGURO DE RIESGO LABORAL',`tabSalary Detail`.amount,
  (IF (salary_component = 'US SEGURO DE RIESGO LABORAL 2',`tabSalary Detail`.amount,"0")))),MAX(IF (salary_component = 'SEGURO DE RIESGO LABORAL',`tabSalary Detail`.amount,
  (IF (salary_component = 'SEGURO DE RIESGO LABORAL 2',`tabSalary Detail`.amount,"0"))))) AS "SRL:Float:75"

FROM
  ((`tabSalary Slip`
INNER JOIN `tabSalary Detail` ON `tabSalary Slip`.name = `tabSalary Detail`.parent)
INNER JOIN tabEmployee ON `tabSalary Slip`.employee = tabEmployee.name)
WHERE
`tabSalary Detail`.parenttype = "Salary Slip" AND 
`tabSalary Detail`.parent = `tabSalary Slip`.`name` AND 
`tabSalary Detail`.parentfield = "earnings" AND
`tabSalary Slip`.start_date between %(from_date)s and %(to_date)s AND
`tabSalary Slip`.company = %(company)s
GROUP BY
 `tabSalary Detail`.parent
